aboutMeText: Hello, I am Reinaldo Bellorin, a passionate web developer with a degree in Computer Science (TSU). I specialize in development using Python, my favorite language, to create efficient and powerful web applications. I also find inspiration in the music of Gustavo Cerati, whose melodies accompany me in my creative process. My motto is 'I have no enemies,' a philosophy that reflects my collaborative and positive approach to challenges. I am excited to contribute to innovative projects and continue growing as a professional in the world of web development.

projects.title: Occupational Health and Safety System
projects.body: This system facilitates the management of security processes in the different departments, allowing the analysis of deviations, corrections and other related aspects.

projects.title: Administrative System for Real Estate Management La Plata
projects.body: This system enables comprehensive real estate management, facilitating the handling of payments, debts, contracts, tenants, and properties. Administrators can register and update property information, manage rental contracts, keep a detailed record of tenant payments, and track outstanding debts. Additionally, it includes automated reports and a module for contract renewal.

projects.title: Task App
projects.body: A mobile app developed with Dart/Flutter, connected with Firebase for Google login and session data storage. It allows users to add, edit, and share tasks with other users via email. It is also connected to a backend built in Python for task management and additional data handling.

projects.title: Digital Illustrator Web Portfolio
projects.body: A web page with dynamic routes and SSR built with Next.js / React, including API creation to retrieve various gallery images, allowing the user to select which to view through the URL.

projects.title: Temporary Email
projects.body: A frontend application connected to an API that provides temporary emails, allowing users to receive emails from various addresses in real-time.

projects.title: Medical Consultations App
projects.body: A desktop application for managing consultations, medical histories, and X-rays. It allows the user (doctor) to keep track of all registered patients and their respective information.

projects.title: School Schedule App
projects.body: A desktop application for managing school schedules at the Industrial Administration University Institute (IUTA). It helps manage teachers, classrooms, and sessions across different campuses, among other functions.

projects.title: Currency API
projects.body: An API developed for direct data collection from the Central Bank of Venezuela's website, allowing users to obtain currency exchange rates.

projects.title: School Newspaper
projects.body: A school newspaper with the ability to publish news, important events, curiosities, etc., along with information related to the institution.

projects.title: Currency Converter
projects.body: This application allows you to convert various currencies using up-to-date data from the Currency API.
